name: The Greebles
description:
Help the Greebles in a fun, engaging adventure game!

It seems that something is amiss in the Greebles Village! Play as Chief Greeble and uncover the answers to the mysteries plaguing the village. Where did the carrots go? Why are all the crops suddenly withering? Where do Greebles go when they disappear? And why is the grass just so wonderful?

Answer all these questions and more on a fun, lovable adventure!
